mapper.select: select b.name as "adminName", b.mobile as "adminMobile", b.email as "adminEmail", a.name as "orgName", a.code as "orgCode", b.id as "adminId" from ORG_ORGANIZATION_INFO a inner join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.code=#{orgCode}
select id as "id" from sys_user where mobile=#{mobile}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_ORGANIZATION_INFO( id, code, name, user_id, credt, moddt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{userId}, #{credt}, #{moddt} )
mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.login_name as "loginName", a.no, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.user_type as "userType", a.login_flag as "loginFlag", a.del_flag as "delFlag" from sys_user a where a.org_Code=#{orgCode} order by a.create_date

select a.id as "id", a.code as "code", a.name as "name", a.user_id as "userId", a.licence_status as "licenceStatus", a.log_status as "logStatus", a.loa_status as "loaStatus", a.status as "status", a.credt as "credt", a.moddt as "moddt" from org_organization_info a where a.code=#{orgCode}
